name: Maintenance on our billing system
content:
During this maintenance window you won't be able to succesfully complete some operations such as:

- make changes to your plan (buying a plan, upgrading / downgrading a plan, etc.)
- update your billing profile
- pay overdue amounts
- destroy your account, if you are currently on a paid plan
- transfer a site, if you are on a legacy "per-project" paid plan
- destroy a site, if you are on a legacy "per-project" paid plan

Automatic plan adjustments that we apply to your plan, such as adding an extra collaborator, will be executed after the maintenance.
